name: ACM Deadlines by location
body:
## ACM Deadlines by Location

Shows the submission deadlines for the next six months of ACM conferences on a clickable map or in a list.

Check it out [the map](http://acm-deadlines.herokuapp.com/) and [the list](http://acm-deadlines.herokuapp.com/list)

The goal is to provide a different interface to the ACM conference deadline calendar. Ideally, we would be able to

  * sort by date
  * sort by location
  * sort by conference

The data is scraped statically from http://campus.acm.org/public/cfpcal/Index.cfm

Last scrape: May 30, 2012
tagline: The next six months of ACM conference submission deadlines shown by geographical location
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
